question: Can you check if the latest pull requests in my repo meet our code quality standards and let me know if there are any issues?
Check my team's main repositories for any vulnerable dependencies and make sure all licenses are compliant. Also, let me know if there are any code scanning alerts I should be aware of.
Can you check all our repos to see if they have CI pipelines set up and the right license files? Let me know which ones are missing anything.
I made some code changes and want to commit them, push to GitHub, open a pull request, and get Copilot to review it all from my editor.
Whenever there is a new notification on a GitHub repo, can you send a formatted alert to our team chat and trigger a follow-up workflow?
Can you check if our codebase meets the required quality standards and compliance rules, and make sure we have the right CI and security checks in place?
Can you check if my project is using only approved licenses and also tell me if there are any code quality issues or bugs I need to fix?

Set up secure access for different user groups to specific Azure Search indexes and OpenAI resources, making sure only authorized users can run queries and see results. Also, make sure the right permissions and policies are in place for each group.
Can you help me compare the performance metrics and recent logs for my cloud resources across Azure and AWS, and also analyze the workflow coverage for my AWS Step Functions?
Why am I seeing performance issues on my Azure VMs? Can you check if there are any alerts and show me the recent metrics and logs?
I want to test my AWS Step Functions locally, make sure they're valid, and then automatically collect the logs or evidence for compliance reporting.
Check if all my Azure resource groups and deployed functions are following our company policy for CI and security. Also, make sure the right pipelines and security scans are set up.
I have a Step Functions workflow in YAML, can you check if it's valid, simulate it locally, and help me understand any issues or improvements?
How can I make sure my Azure function always uses the latest config and quickly roll back if something goes wrong? Also, can I check if the cached config is still valid?
I need to move some data from my Azure Search indexes into OpenSearch so I can do more advanced analytics. Can you help me figure out what indexes I have, pull the data, and push it into OpenSearch?
I want to make my knowledge base searchable using AI. Can you help me connect my existing articles, ingest them into a vector database, and set up a way to search them by relevance?
Can you answer questions about what's in these images based on the data I've stored?
Find the most relevant documents for a given topic and rank them by similarity to a user query.
Can you help me analyze our user profile data warehouse, summarize key attributes, and then make this information searchable in Azure Search?
I have a bunch of new metrics data and profiling outputs I want to analyze and run some queries on. Can you help me get this data loaded and then summarize key metrics or trends?
Can you help me get all the campsite listings from Campertunity and make them searchable in Azure AI Search? I want to be able to search and filter them by location and amenities.
Why did my server's CPU usage spike and is it related to any network latency issues users are reporting globally?
My server is running slow and some services aren't responding. Can you check what's going on and see if any network ports are blocked or if there's anything unusual with the system?
Can you help me figure out why my web app is running slow by checking Azure logs and metrics and also looking at real-time stats from Netdata?
Before launching new AWS resources, check if there are any network issues from different global locations to our endpoint and also make sure our workflow will run as expected.
Check if a website is reachable and compare latency and open ports from different locations using both ICMP and TCP.
Why are my server metrics spiking and what do the recent logs say? Can you help me correlate the log entries with the Netdata charts?
I have a scanned document, can you pull out the text and answer some questions about what's inside?
Can you help me process these support tickets and get a summary of each, categorize them, and then provide a chat-based response to the customer?
Can you pull the main points from my latest Notion meeting notes and give me a summary?
I have a bunch of audio recordings of people reading out invoices. Can you help me get the invoice details out of these?
I have a bunch of customer feedback messages. Can you help me figure out what type of feedback each one is, and then help me draft responses to them?
How do I use the zip function in Python to combine two lists? Can you explain with an example?
I have a knowledge graph in Hiveflow and want to bring that data into Memgraph so I can run some Cypher queries and see how the schema looks. Can you help me set this up and show me how to query it?
Can you answer questions about the relationships in my graph database after checking what tables and columns are available?
Find similar research papers to a given document and then explore how these papers are connected in a citation network. Show me the relationships between the most relevant papers.
Can you check which DWS nodes are healthy, update their configuration if needed, and then show me how they are connected in the system?
Can you help me find the main fields in this dataset and then show me how to group the data for analysis?
Set up an automated workflow that sends SMS notifications when a scheduled event occurs, and make sure the message content is formatted properly before sending.
Set up an automation so that when a specific webhook is triggered from another service, a LINE message with multiple action buttons is sent to users.
When someone fills out our website form, can you automatically pull up their contact details and engagement history in HubSpot for our sales team?
When something happens in a Liveblocks room, can you notify all the participants via chat and also make sure the notification is sent through Twilio?
Sync the status of Shortcut stories with their linked GitHub issues and update both if there are any discrepancies. Also, show me which stories are not yet linked to issues.
Whenever a story in Shortcut changes status, update the relevant Notion page with the new status and add a comment about the change. Make sure the status format matches Notion's requirements.
I have some CDK Step Function constructs and I want to move them to a YAML-based workflow system. Can you help me convert these and make sure the definitions are valid?
I have a Step Functions workflow in JSON, can you check if it's valid and let me try running it locally to see if it works before I deploy?
I need to upload a batch of images and videos, make sure the metadata is set, store a backup in Azure, and check if everything is performing well.
I need to deploy a new container workload, make sure the right image is used, check the deployment status, and ensure the nodes and resources are healthy and properly managed.

Can you check which users have access to sensitive resources and make sure their entitlements in Auth0 are being continuously monitored for compliance? Also, let me know if any access needs to be reviewed or updated.
I need to update my 3D project with new models and textures, make sure the images are optimized for web, and organize everything in the scene.
Can you analyze the codebase of a repository to show me how the modules depend on each other and generate a report or diagram of the structure?
Can you check the mood of our team by analyzing the comments on our recent GitHub issues?
Whenever a new issue is created or updated in a GitHub repository, automatically create a corresponding action in Linear and keep it in sync. Show me how to set this up.
When a pull request gets approved, find the most helpful comments in the discussion and upvote them.

I need help understanding how a recent bug was fixed in our repo and whether the latest changes might impact our authentication logic. Can you walk me through the relevant code and explain what changed?
I have some code that references a few functions I don't recognize. Can you help me find documentation or examples for these functions?
Update the comments in this codebase with the latest best practices and references from the web.
Can you help me find the latest dependency injection configuration in our repo, validate it, and update the settings in our application accordingly?
Whenever finance-related code is merged, generate and retrieve the latest financial report for the relevant accounts.
When a new branch is created in our GitHub repo, can you make sure the related feature flag is enabled in LaunchDarkly for that branch?
Can you help me analyze our team's pull request activity and code review times for the past quarter and generate a report?

Set up alerts so I get notified when the price of my favorite cryptocurrencies goes above or below certain values. Also, make sure these alerts can be triggered automatically and sent to my phone or email.
Show me how the top cryptocurrencies by market cap have changed over the past year and visualize the trends in an interactive dashboard.
Can you help me analyze the price history of Bitcoin and identify any unusual price spikes or drops over the last year?
Check if the API for getting live Bitcoin prices is working quickly from different countries and make sure the price is accurate.
Can you show me the current prices and market caps for top cryptocurrencies and also let me know how my system resources are doing while fetching this data?
Can you make a chart showing the price changes of Bitcoin over the last month and give me a link to the image?
Can you get the latest price for Bitcoin and save it as a file in my GitHub repo, then show me where that file is stored in the workflow artifacts?
Can you check which users in our CRM want price alerts for Bitcoin and what the current price is?

I want to pull historical market chart data for several cryptocurrencies and set up an automated workflow in AWS to store and analyze this data over time. Can you help me get the data and make sure the workflow is ready for deployment?
I need to update the 3D models in my visualization app and make sure the new assets are available for users. Can you help me upload the new files, update the project, and verify everything is set up?

Can you check if there are any recent hardware or firmware issues with my OctoEverywhere-connected 3D printer and also see if there are any unusual performance metrics or logs in Azure related to the system?
Can you help me analyze the recent performance trends of our Azure resources and generate a report with advanced analytics?
Can you pull recent Azure function usage for our customers and update their HubSpot contact profiles with this data?
I need to test my Azure VM image in a NanoVMs environment. Can you help me move the image over, deploy it, and check if itâ€™s running correctly?
How do I check what configuration keys are set for my Azure App Configuration and what their current values are?
Let me know whenever new Azure resources are created in my subscription and send a notification to my team.
Can you check the recent commit messages in our Azure DevOps project and tell me if the team is feeling positive or negative overall?
Can you get the audio feedback files from my Azure storage and transcribe them to text?
Can you give me a summary of what happened in my Azure function logs last week?
Can you check the mood of the comments I highlighted in my code?
Can you help me generate forum questions from the code comments in my current project files?
Find the latest example of how to use the requests library in Python from the web and add it to my currently open script in VSCode.
Can you take a screenshot or grab the code I'm working on right now and upload it to my Cloudinary account for sharing?
Whenever I save changes to a file in my project, automatically commit and push the changes, then trigger a Zapier workflow that formats some of the file content and sends it to another app.
I need help understanding this code and fixing a bug I found. Can you explain what this function does and suggest how to fix the error?
Can you walk me through this code file and generate an audio explanation for each section?
My VSCode crashed and I want to quickly restore my previous editor session with all the files and tabs I had open. Can you help me get back to where I was?
Update the main player movement script in my PlayCanvas project to add double jump and make sure the changes are synced in the editor.
Can you help me analyze my AWS billing workflows for errors and inefficiencies and then visualize the usage and cost data in a dashboard?
How can I check if my Step Functions workflow is valid and also see if there are any performance issues or alerts on my EC2 instance?
Check if my AWS endpoints are exposed and make sure my security group rules are working. Also, can you confirm my workflow definitions are valid?
Can you help me review our AWS Step Functions workflows for errors and optimization, and then log any significant usage events or workflow changes as activities in our HubSpot CRM?

Set up an automated process to monitor AWS spending and trigger a fund transfer from a linked bank account when a certain threshold is reached. Make sure the workflow is correct and test it before deploying.

I need to make sure my AWS Lambda workflow is secure and only accessible to certain users. Can you help me check the workflow definition, simulate it locally, and set up the right authentication policies?
I need to make sure our AWS Step Functions workflow is valid and simulate it locally, then set up a collaborative session where certain users have admin roles and can see who is in the room.

I want to set up OctoEverywhere agents on AWS EC2, make sure my workflow for deploying and managing 3D printers is valid, simulate the workflow before deployment, and check the printer and system status remotely.
Can you help me analyze my AWS resource tags and summarize what kinds of workflows or steps are most common?
I have a bunch of AWS Step Function logs that are exported as PDFs. Can you extract the text and check if the workflow definitions in them are valid?
Can you set up something that checks the mood of our customer feedback and automatically sends the results to another system?
Can you help me update our HubSpot contact profiles with insights from recent support tickets, including how customers are feeling and any important details mentioned?
Can you check which of our support tickets are high priority and see if any of them are related to compliance issues that need to be monitored?
I have a bunch of support tickets and I need to figure out which users are mentioned in them and then match those users to their Auth0 profiles.
Can you check how customers felt during our last batch of support calls and let me know if there were any negative interactions?

I need to figure out why my application is failing when processing user uploads and trace how the data moves through the code. Can you help me scan the codebase, analyze the data flow, and debug the dependencies?
Check if my project meets code quality standards and analyze its dependencies. Also, make sure there are automated tests and a CI pipeline set up.
Can you analyze my codebase, generate an architectural diagram, and make it available online?
Can you help me scan my codebase, generate a model of the application, and visualize the structure and relationships in PlayCanvas?
Can you help me understand the trends in our code quality and generate a report that highlights any issues or improvements over the last few months?
Can you help me get all our internal knowledge base articles into our search system so employees can find them easily?
Connect to our external data sources and give me an overview of the structure and key tables in the new dataset.
Can you help me find the latest policy updates and explain how they impact our team's workflow? Also, if there are any important changes, summarize them for me.
Can you update our internal knowledge articles about the latest trends in AI by pulling in recent web search results and making sure the information is current?
Whenever a new knowledge article is added, make sure a ticket is automatically created in Linear for it. Also, make sure the ticket has the right info from the article.
Can you show me which Hiveflow articles are being used the most in ThoughtSpot and how their usage has changed over time?
Find available campsites for a group trip, book the best option, and make sure the booking details are synced with our HubSpot deals pipeline for tracking.
I want to book a campsite, send a confirmation message to the host, and trigger an automated email confirmation to myself with the booking details formatted nicely.
I just booked a campsite for next weekend, can you send me a voice confirmation of my reservation details?
Find a campsite near Vancouver for next weekend, make sure my account is set up and I have the right permissions to book, then reserve the spot for two people.
Why is my website slow to load in different countries? Can you check DNS and network latency issues globally?
I'm having trouble connecting to a remote server, can you figure out where the connection is failing and if any ports are blocked?
Why are some of my websites taking a long time to load? Can you check if there are DNS issues and alert me if there are any delays?
Can you monitor a list of IP addresses and alert me if any are from suspicious or high-risk countries?
Find recent articles about advancements in renewable energy, organize them for fast search, and let me quickly look up specific topics or authors.
I have a bunch of meeting recordings and I want to find all the parts where a certain topic was discussed. Can you help me search through them?
I have a bunch of scanned financial reports with tables. Can you help me extract the tables, store them for semantic search, and let me query them later?
Can you show me insights on how similar product descriptions are distributed across my database and visualize the results in a dashboard?
Show me similar images to this one and store previews of the results somewhere I can access them later.
Can you help me find recent issues in my repository, summarize what people are saying in the comments, and tell me if the feedback is mostly positive or negative?
Find a repository related to our product, check the latest pull requests, analyze the code changes for quality issues, and see if the project passes the quality gate.

I need to find some active open source repositories related to data science, check if they have any open pull requests, see if their code quality meets standards, and make sure their dependencies are secure and compliant.

I have a bunch of AWS Step Functions in JSON and I want to convert them to YAML, check if they're valid, simulate one locally, and then search for related workflow logs in OpenSearch. Also, I need to update a status flag in Redis when the simulation is complete.
I need to move some files from Azure storage to Cloudinary, update their metadata, and then make them available as assets in my PlayCanvas project. Can you help me with this?
I need to review the latest code updates, analyze how data flows through the new changes, and make sure the project passes all code quality checks before merging. Can you help me with this?
I made some changes to my project and want to make sure all dependencies are up to date and then share a report of the current state of the codebase with my team. Can you help me with this?
Can you help me review recent customer support tickets, identify which ones are most urgent, analyze the sentiment of the messages, and provide more details about the customers who submitted them?
Can you help me review recent feedback in our Notion database, summarize the main points, analyze the sentiment, and leave a comment with the summary and sentiment on the relevant Notion page?

I want to set up an automated workflow that sends a personalized SMS to customers after they make a purchase, tracks the engagement, and generates a weekly report of campaign performance across multiple Twilio accounts. Can you help me get this all working together?
Can you help me find out which servers had high CPU usage last week, check if there were any related alerts, and add a summary of these incidents to our incident tracking system?

I have a large dataset of user activity logs that I want to analyze for trends and search efficiently. Can you help me set up the database, import the data, make sure it's indexed for fast search, and also update the search engine to support new fields in the data?

I have several datasets with user activity logs and transaction records. I want to organize them, import them into a database, and then analyze user behavior by joining the tables, filtering by date, grouping by user segments, and calculating key metrics.
I have a bunch of new product images and videos that need to be uploaded, tagged with metadata, transformed for web and mobile, and then made searchable in our catalog. Can you help me set this up?

I need to investigate a suspicious domain I found in my server logs. Can you find out who owns it, where it's located, what its DNS records look like, and if there are any recent reports or news about it?
Find a campsite near a lake that's available next weekend, book it for two people, and help me write a message to the host asking about firewood availability.

I have a bunch of customer support voicemails in different languages. Can you transcribe them, translate them to English, and then store the results in our database? Also, I need to send the transcriptions to our CRM via their API.

I need to review all my current MCP deployments, get details about their configurations, and find any recent security advisories that might affect them. Also, summarize the key risks for each deployment.

I have a bunch of scanned contracts and I want to find all the ones that mention specific clauses about data privacy. Can you help me extract the text, import it into a database, and then search for relevant documents?

I need to analyze customer purchase patterns by combining transaction data with user profiles, filter for purchases in the last quarter, group by product category, and sort by total sales. Also, find similar customers based on their purchase vectors.
I have a large set of customer support tickets and want to quickly understand the main issues, see the overall sentiment, and find similar past tickets for some of the most common problems.
I need to find some open source repositories related to machine learning, check their recent pull requests, and make sure their dependencies are up to date and compliant with open source licenses.
I want to review all my current projects, scan them for issues, and get a sense of their dependencies and any problems that need to be fixed.
I have a bunch of research documents and I want to organize them in a database, split them into different groups, and also keep a summary of each group in Notion. Can you help me set this up?

I need to set up a new 3D project, upload a bunch of media assets, organize them, and make sure all the asset metadata is searchable. Also, I want to import some external data into a database for later querying and manage the collections for that data.

I have a bunch of files with different types of data and I want to set up a new database to organize, index, and search through them efficiently. Can you help me get started and show me how to find specific records once the data is loaded?
Why is my website slow for users in different countries? Can you check if it's up everywhere, see if there are any DNS issues, look at server performance, and find any related error logs?
I want to monitor my server's CPU and memory usage, get alerts if something goes wrong, and send formatted notifications to my custom dashboard. How do I set this up?

Can you review my open source repository and tell me if it meets best practices for documentation, testing, licensing, CI/CD, and security scanning? I want to make sure it's ready for new contributors.
Can you check if there are any current security alerts on our systems, see if any are related to access control misconfigurations, and confirm if our access policies are set up correctly?
Can you check if my repo has all the right CI/CD setup, security scanning, documentation, and feature flags configured? I want to make sure everything is ready for a new release.

Why are some of my services running slow and are there any alerts or logs that can help me figure out if it's a network or server issue? Also, can you check if there are any recent changes in the logs or data?
I need to pull recent customer feedback from our database, summarize the main points, and then reformat the summaries for a weekly report. Can you help automate this process?

Our web app is having intermittent outages and some users can't log in. Can you check if it's a network issue or something with our Azure backend? Also, see if there are any recent changes to user identities.
I want to review all open customer support tickets from this month, see which ones are from unhappy customers, and set up a weekly report to track these going forward.

I need to pull a list of all contacts who have open deals this quarter, get a summary of the pipeline status, generate a report on recent Twilio messaging activity for those contacts, and format the results for a presentation.

I want to set up an automated email campaign for our new product launch, targeting customers who have shown interest in similar products, and then monitor how well the emails are performing. Can you help me organize the product info, set up the campaign, and track engagement?

I need to find out which users in our system have access to sensitive customer data and see what permissions they have, then cross-reference those users with our CRM to get their recent activity and engagement details.

I want to find a campsite near a lake that's available next weekend, book it for 4 people, and message the host to ask if dogs are allowed. Also, I want to make sure my profile is updated with my latest contact info.

I want to find some open source projects related to SMS automation, see what issues they have, and then create a new issue suggesting integration with a webhook that stores incoming SMS data in MongoDB. Can you help me with this?
I want to find a campsite near a lake that's available next weekend, book it, and send a message to the host to ask if they allow dogs. Also, help me write a polite message to the host.
Can you show me all the open stories for our Q2 projects, update the status of any that have been completed, and provide an activity summary with analytics on project progress?

I need to find some open source repositories that use AWS Step Functions, check if they have any security or dependency issues, and make sure their workflow definitions are valid. Can you help me with that?
Find all active pull requests for our main repositories, check if any recent changes could impact our feature flags, and review related Azure logs for errors.

Find a popular open source project, check if there are any open pull requests that might introduce code quality issues, and see what files are being changed and if the latest analysis passes the quality gate.
Can you help me find recent issues in our main repo, summarize the main points from the comments, and let me know if people are generally positive or negative about the proposed changes?

I need to investigate why our recent CI builds are failing for a few repositories, check if there are any related infrastructure alerts, and see if there are any error logs or indexed documents about these failures.
Find all recent pull requests related to bug fixes in our main repositories, summarize the changes, and classify them by severity or type.

I need to gather recent news articles about a specific topic, compare their content for similarities and differences, upload the most relevant article to our media platform, and check if similar articles already exist in our search index.
I have a Step Functions workflow in JSON and I want to migrate it to MCP. Can you help me convert it, make sure it's valid, and then set up a new deployment using the right image?
